item.description:

item.title: 瑞士收购公司 Partners 计划出售 50 亿美元基础设施资产
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，Partners Group Holding AG 正在考虑出售旗下一些总价值超过 50 亿美元的基础设施资产，因为这家瑞士收购公司正试图利用投资者对该行业的兴趣。【原文：Partners Group Holding AG is considering the sale of some of its infrastructure assets with a combined value of more than $5 billion as the Swiss buyout firm seeks to take advantage of investor appetite in the sector, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 尼日利亚货币汇率趋同，高盛预测奈拉将上涨
item.description: 由于资本流入激增，奈拉的官方汇率和平行市场汇率在最近几天基本趋于一致，高盛集团因此预测奈拉将在未来几个月内走强。【原文：The official and parallel-market exchange rates for the naira have largely converged in recent days as capital inflows surged, leading Goldman Sachs Group Inc. to predict the currency will strengthen over coming months.】

item.title: KKR 确认意大利电信网络交易将于夏季完成
item.description: KKR & Co.证实，其计划以 220 亿欧元（240 亿美元）收购意大利电信公司（Telecom Italia SpA）网络的交易将于今年夏天完成，以向投资者保证交易的完成。【原文：KKR & Co. confirmed its planned €22 billion ($24 billion) acquisition of Telecom Italia SpA’s network is set to close in the summer, in a bid to reassure investors over the completion of the deal.】

item.title: 莫迪的政党是现已被禁止的选举债券的最大受益者
item.description: 根据印度选举监督机构在全国投票前几周公布的数据，印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪领导的印度人民党在过去五年中通过选举债券获得了近一半的政治捐款。【原文：Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s Bharatiya Janata Party received nearly half of the political donations through electoral bonds over the past five years, according to data released by the nation’s elections watchdog weeks before national polls.】

item.description:

item.title: 美国银行重塑资本市场部，启用新的咨询领导者
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp. ）宣布对其资本市场业务的几位领导层进行调整，并成立了一个新的咨询小组，以便在动荡的市场环境中更好地调整其产品。【原文：Bank of America Corp. announced several leadership changes in its capital markets business and set up a new advisory group to better align its offerings amid volatile market conditions.】

item.title: 住宅建筑商 Lennar 拟 40 亿美元分拆土地控股公司
item.description: 美国最大的住宅建筑商之一莱纳尔公司（Lennar Corp.【原文：Lennar Corp., one of the biggest US homebuilders, says it is considering a $4 billion spinoff of land it holds.】

item.title: 欧盟贸易负责人称塑料包装废弃物规定可能适得其反
item.description: 欧盟贸易负责人警告说，对塑料包装新规则的延迟修改可能会惩罚向该集团出口的较贫穷国家，并增加法律挑战和报复的风险。【原文：The European Union’s trade chief warned that late changes to new rules on plastic packaging could penalize poorer countries that export to the bloc and increase the risk of legal challenges and retaliation.】

item.title: 巴克莱称特朗普第二任期政策引发美元反弹 3
item.description: 巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）的外汇策略师表示，如果前总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）11月再次当选，根据他提出的增加关税、刺激经济和削弱对北约承诺的政策建议，美元将有望反弹3%。【原文：The US dollar would be poised to rally 3% if former President Donald Trump is re-elected in November based on his policy proposals for more tariffs, economic stimulus and a weaker commitment to NATO, according to foreign-exchange strategists at Barclays Plc.】

item.title: 印度燃料零售商将在投票前下调柴油和汽油价格
item.description: 印度国营燃料零售商将从周五起下调柴油和汽油价格，这是近两年来的首次价格调整，而且就在全国大选前几周。【原文：India’s state-run fuel retailers will cut diesel and gasoline prices from Friday, the first rate revision in nearly two years and just few weeks ahead of the national elections.】

item.title: 纽约市 2,640 亿美元养老金未能增加对经济适用房的投资
item.description: 纽约市主计长布拉德-兰德（Brad Lander）一直积极倡导在该市建造更多经济适用房。【原文：New York City Comptroller Brad Lander has been a vocal advocate for more affordable housing in the city.】

item.title: FTX 不断增长的现金堆引发了对已倒闭公司股票的抢购热潮
item.description: 投资者正试图买入已倒闭的加密货币交易所 FTX 的股票，因为如果损失数十亿美元的受害者得到补偿，股票持有者就有可能获得赔偿。【原文：Investors are trying to buy up shares of defunct crypto exchange FTX on the off chance that equity holders could see a recovery if victims who lost billions are made whole.】

item.title: 法国经济增长乏力削弱了马克龙的预算计划
item.description: 根据统计机构 Insee 的最新预测，法国经济正在努力实现埃马纽埃尔-马克龙总统所需的增长，以兑现控制预算赤字的承诺。【原文：France’s economy is struggling to deliver the growth President Emmanuel Macron needs to meet pledges to rein in the budget deficit, according to updated forecasts from statistics agency Insee.】

item.title: 法国兴业银行（SocGen）称，S&P 指数需要上涨 20% 才能看起来像 90 年代的泡沫
item.description: 法国兴业银行（Societe Generale SA）的策略师认为，如果美股正在形成泡沫，那么在泡沫破灭之前，它还有很大的膨胀空间。【原文：If a bubble is forming in US stocks, it has plenty of room to expand before it bursts, according to strategists at Societe Generale SA.】

item.title: 中国特使表示，尽管加拿大矿业受到打压，但中国仍将投资加拿大矿业
item.description: 中国驻加拿大大使表示，尽管加拿大总理贾斯汀-特鲁多（Justin Trudeau）"不幸 "打击了外国投资，但中国将继续在加拿大国内关键矿产领域开展业务。【原文：China’s ambassador says the country will continue to do business in Canada’s domestic critical minerals sector despite Prime Minister Justin Trudeau’s “unfortunate” crackdown on foreign investment.】

item.title: 日本每日新闻报道称日本央行将结束负利率后日元汇率波动
item.description: 周四，一份关于日本央行准备在下周结束负利率政策的报告短暂提振了日元，但随后由于交易员对日本央行的决定缺乏信心，日元迅速回落。【原文：The yen got a brief boost Thursday from a report that the Bank of Japan is poised to end its negative rate policy next week, and then quickly surrendered the advance as traders lacked conviction around the central bank’s decision.】

item.title: 纽约市银行出售 10 亿多美元贷款获得收益
item.description: 纽约社区银行（New York Community Bancorp）是一家陷入困境的商业房地产贷款公司，刚刚获得了由史蒂文-姆努钦（Steven Mnuchin）领导的集团的注资。【原文：New York Community Bancorp, the troubled commercial real estate lender that just got a capital infusion from a group led by Steven Mnuchin, said it will book a gain after selling a portfolio of consumer loans with a net book value of $899 million as well as a co-op loan.】

item.title: Albemarle 计划拍卖锂，旨在获得 "公平 "估值
item.description: 全球最大的锂生产商 Albemarle 公司计划通过拍卖出售部分金属，并表示这将有助于提高不透明市场的透明度。【原文：The world’s biggest lithium producer, Albemarle Corp., plans to sell some of its metal in auctions, which it says will help make an opaque market more transparent.】

item.title: 苏拉投资公司认为墨西哥近岸外包热潮是增长的关键
item.description: 随着制造商寻求将生产设施迁移到墨西哥和美国边境附近，这一趋势被称为 "近岸化"，苏拉投资公司预计将从中受益。【原文：Sura Investments expects to benefit as manufacturers seek to move production facilities near the border between Mexico and the US, a trend known as “nearshoring.”】

item.title: 南非斯帕尔退出波兰后将专注于本土市场
item.description: 南非收入排名第二的杂货商 Spar Group Ltd. 计划削减债务，并在今年退出波兰市场后专注于本土市场。【原文：Spar Group Ltd., South Africa’s second-largest grocer by revenue, plans to cut debt and focus on its home market after exiting Poland this year.】

item.title: 土耳其创全球金融危机以来最低债券利差
item.description: 土耳其近三年来首次出售欧元债券，因为其风险溢价已降至全球金融危机以来的最低点。【原文：Turkey is selling its first bonds in euros in almost three years as its risk premium narrowed to the lowest since the global financial crisis.】

item.title: 标准银行称允许奈拉走弱是 "正确之举
item.description: 标准银行集团有限公司（Standard Bank Group Ltd.）总裁表示，尼日利亚央行整顿国家外汇市场并允许奈拉走软的举措是建立秩序所必需的。【原文：Standard Bank Group Ltd.’s chief said the Nigerian central bank’s moves to revamp the nation’s foreign-exchange market and allow the naira to weaken are necessary to create order.】

item.title: 创纪录的美国原油流入冲击欧洲每日石油市场
item.description: 随着大量原油从美国进口到欧洲，炼油厂因计划内和计划外的维护而停产，欧洲的石油现货市场正在走弱，抑制了市场的反弹。【原文：Physical oil markets in Europe are weakening — quashing a rally — as a gush of crude imports from the US head toward a region where refineries are shutting down operations for both planned and unplanned maintenance.】

item.title: 监视：对美联储而言，"六月 "现在看起来更像是 "稍后"。
item.description:
富国银行的布赖森表示，5月份 "不在讨论之列"，7月份更有可能

。【原文：

May is ‘off the table,’ and July is more likely, Wells Fargo’s Bryson says

】

item.title: 受困于旧资产的收购公司向私人信贷寻求帮助
item.description: 收购公司正竭力脱手已持有数年的公司，并向投资者返还现金，它们在 1.7 万亿美元的私人信贷市场上找到了盟友。【原文：Buyout firms struggling to offload companies they’ve held for several years and return cash to investors are finding allies in the $1.7 trillion private credit market.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利赢得 140 万欧元法国奖金与辞职银行家之争
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）在一场法庭斗争中获胜，推翻了一名银行家获得的 140 万欧元（150 万美元）递延奖金。【原文：Morgan Stanley won a court fight to overturn €1.4 million ($1.5 million) in deferred bonuses given to a banker who sued for the award after he quit the investment bank for one of his biggest clients.】

item.title: 美国力推绿色燃料威胁阿根廷主要出口市场
item.description: 美国对绿色柴油的推动对阿根廷最大的出口产品构成了威胁。【原文：A push by the US into green diesel poses a threat to Argentina’s biggest export.】

item.title: 劳斯莱斯在首席执行官扭亏为盈之际重获投资级评级
item.description: 劳斯莱斯控股公司（Rolls-Royce Holdings Plc）重新获得标准普尔（Standard & Poor's）的投资级信用评级，这是该公司近四年来首次获得这一评级，因为投资者对这家在首席执行官图凡-埃尔金比勒吉奇（Tufan Erginbilgic）领导下实现扭亏为盈的英国飞机发动机制造商持更有利的看法。【原文：Rolls-Royce Holdings Plc regained an investment-grade credit rating with Standard & Poor’s for the first time in almost four years, as investors take a more favorable view of the UK aircraft engine manufacturer undergoing a turnaround under Chief Executive Officer Tufan Erginbilgic.】

item.title: 美国银行哈特内特称，大科技和加密货币飙升导致市场出现泡沫迹象
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp）首席投资策略师迈克尔-哈特奈特（Michael Hartnett）表示，科技股所谓的 "华丽七股 "创纪录的飙升以及加密货币的历史新高，都显示出市场存在泡沫的特征。首席投资策略师迈克尔-哈特内特（Michael Hartnett）表示。【原文：Markets are showing characteristics of a bubble in the record-setting surge by tech’s so-called Magnificent Seven stocks and the all-time highs in cryptocurrencies, according to Bank of America Corp. Chief Investment Strategist Michael Hartnett.】
